text:
thanx for uploading this song also.

I still think Super Mario RPG is the best RPG. Maybe it's because it was my first RPG game. But damn, they don't make these games anymore. I really wish Nintendo and Square would get along and remake this in fully updated graphics.

I would so buy an entire console just to play this game lol

text: I remember playing this game so much as a kid. No one will believe me but I always played with the remote upside down and it never bothered me. text: I always loved Booster's Tower, it felt like a fun ride. The funny paintings, Booster's train, the part where you transform into oldschool 8bit Mario, the top of the tower where you have to move and hide behind the curtains. Love it! This song is like some kind of awesome elevator music.
